name: Mortimer Beckett and the Book of Gold
summary: Get ready for adventure with Mortimer Beckett and the Book of Gold! Featuring introverted thinker Mortimer and spontaneous extrovert Kate, embark on an unexpected journey full of riddles and mysteries. What secrets lie written within the Book of Gold? Discover the beauty of emotion and the value of companionship in Mortimer Beckett and the Book of Gold.
